mapper.sql: t.PROCURE_CATALOG_ID, t.GOODS_ID, t.PRODUCT_NAME, t.GOODS_NAME, t.MEDICINE_MODEL, t.OUT_LOOK, t.FACTOR, t.MATERIAL_NAME, t.UNIT, t.COMPANY_ID_SC, t.COMPANY_NAME_SC, t.COMPANY_ID_TB, t.COMPANY_NAME_TB, t.PURCHASE_TYPE, t.SOURCE_NAME, t.MIDDLE_PACK, t.MAX_PACK, t.BID_PRICE, t.COM_PRICE, t.ISURBMI, t.MEDICALINSURANCE_TYPE, t.ISBASICDRUG, t.IS_USING, t.ISPILOT, t.ID, t.ADD_TIME, t.LAST_UPDATE_TIME
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BASE_DRUGINFO_PROVINCE( PROCURE_CATALOG_ID , GOODS_ID , PRODUCT_NAME , GOODS_NAME , MEDICINE_MODEL , OUT_LOOK , FACTOR , MATERIAL_NAME , UNIT , COMPANY_ID_SC , COMPANY_NAME_SC , COMPANY_ID_TB , COMPANY_NAME_TB , PURCHASE_TYPE , SOURCE_NAME , MIDDLE_PACK , MAX_PACK , BID_PRICE , COM_PRICE , ISURBMI , MEDICALINSURANCE_TYPE , ISBASICDRUG , IS_USING , ISPILOT , ID , ADD_TIME , LAST_UPDATE_TIME ) VALUES ( #{procureCatalogId} , #{goodsId} , #{productName} , #{goodsName} , #{medicineModel} , #{outLook} , #{factor} , #{materialName} , #{unit} , #{companyIdSc} , #{companyNameSc} , #{companyIdTb} , #{companyNameTb} , #{purchaseType} , #{sourceName} , #{middlePack} , #{maxPack} , #{bidPrice} , #{comPrice} , #{isurbmi} , #{medicalinsuranceType} , #{isbasicdrug} , #{isUsing} , #{ispilot} , #{id} , #{addTime} , #{lastUpdateTime} )

INSERT INTO BASE_DRUGINFO_PROVINCE ( PROCURE_CATALOG_ID , GOODS_ID , PRODUCT_NAME , GOODS_NAME , MEDICINE_MODEL , OUT_LOOK , FACTOR , MATERIAL_NAME , UNIT , COMPANY_ID_SC , COMPANY_NAME_SC , COMPANY_ID_TB , COMPANY_NAME_TB , PURCHASE_TYPE , SOURCE_NAME , MIDDLE_PACK , MAX_PACK , BID_PRICE , COM_PRICE , ISURBMI , MEDICALINSURANCE_TYPE , ISBASICDRUG , IS_USING , ISPILOT , ID , ADD_TIME , LAST_UPDATE_TIME )
SELECT #{item.procureCatalogId}, #{item.goodsId}, #{item.productName}, #{item.goodsName}, #{item.medicineModel}, #{item.outLook}, #{item.factor}, #{item.materialName}, #{item.unit}, #{item.companyIdSc}, #{item.companyNameSc}, #{item.companyIdTb}, #{item.companyNameTb}, #{item.purchaseType}, #{item.sourceName}, #{item.middlePack}, #{item.maxPack}, #{item.bidPrice}, #{item.comPrice}, #{item.isurbmi}, #{item.medicalinsuranceType}, #{item.isbasicdrug}, #{item.isUsing}, #{item.ispilot}, #{item.id}, #{item.addTime}, #{item.lastUpdateTime} FROM DUAL
mapper.update:
UPDATE BASE_DRUGINFO_PROVINCE
GOODS_ID = #{goodsId},
PRODUCT_NAME = #{productName},
GOODS_NAME = #{goodsName},
MEDICINE_MODEL = #{medicineModel},
OUT_LOOK = #{outLook},
FACTOR = #{factor},
MATERIAL_NAME = #{materialName},
UNIT = #{unit},
COMPANY_ID_SC = #{companyIdSc},
COMPANY_NAME_SC = #{companyNameSc},
COMPANY_ID_TB = #{companyIdTb},
COMPANY_NAME_TB = #{companyNameTb},
PURCHASE_TYPE = #{purchaseType},
SOURCE_NAME = #{sourceName},
MIDDLE_PACK = #{middlePack},
MAX_PACK = #{maxPack},
BID_PRICE = #{bidPrice},
COM_PRICE = #{comPrice},
ISURBMI = #{isurbmi},
MEDICALINSURANCE_TYPE = #{medicalinsuranceType},
ISBASICDRUG = #{isbasicdrug},
IS_USING = #{isUsing},
ISPILOT = #{ispilot},
ID = #{id},
ADD_TIME = #{addTime},
LAST_UPDATE_TIME = #{lastUpdateTime},
WHERE PROCURE_CATALOG_ID = #{procureCatalogId}

UPDATE BASE_DRUGINFO_PROVINCE t
GOODS_ID = #{model.goodsId},
PRODUCT_NAME = #{model.productName},
GOODS_NAME = #{model.goodsName},
MEDICINE_MODEL = #{model.medicineModel},
OUT_LOOK = #{model.outLook},

MATERIAL_NAME = #{model.materialName},
UNIT = #{model.unit},

COMPANY_NAME_SC = #{model.companyNameSc},
COMPANY_ID_TB = #{model.companyIdTb},
COMPANY_NAME_TB = #{model.companyNameTb},
PURCHASE_TYPE = #{model.purchaseType},
SOURCE_NAME = #{model.sourceName},
MIDDLE_PACK = #{model.middlePack},
MAX_PACK = #{model.maxPack},
BID_PRICE = #{model.bidPrice},
COM_PRICE = #{model.comPrice},
ISURBMI = #{model.isurbmi},
MEDICALINSURANCE_TYPE = #{model.medicalinsuranceType},

IS_USING = #{model.isUsing},
ISPILOT = #{model.ispilot},
ID = #{model.id},
